titles.title: A joint resolution designating May 1987 as "National Play-It-Safe Month".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/6/1987--Introduced. Designates May 1987 as National Play-It-Safe Month, observing the Play-It-Safe program, providing safety and crime prevention education to children.
